Explore loan options

moonlight Home Loans &
Mortgage Refinance

Lone Star Financing offers low rates, low fees and a streamlined home buying process to close loans fast. We are a top mortgage lender in moonlight for new home purchases and refinancing.  As a direct lender with in-house underwriting we strive to close all loans in 30 days or less.  Whether buying a new home or refinancing, Lone Star Financing has got you covered!  

Buy a Home
Refinance
Cash-out
Why Lone Star Financing?

Close on Time

Our goal is to close every loan in 28 days or less. In-house underwriting, processing, and closing for fast approval and on-time fundings.

Low Rates & Fees

Transcope Mortgage Lender with Low Mortgage Rates. FHA, VA, and USDA Approved Lender.

Customer Service

Local to moonlight - top-notch customer support. We will be with you at every step from application to closing. Read what our customers are saying!

Transcope Mortgage Lender
Our moonlight Home Loans

New Home Loans

New Home Purchase

  • Primary Home, 2nd Home, Investment
  • Low Rates & Low Fees
  • Conventional, FHA, USDA and VA
  • 30-Year & 20-Year Fixed Rates

Learn More Apply Now

Mortgage Refinance

Refinance Today & Save!

  • Reduce Monthly Payment
  • Shorten Mortgage Term
  • Cash-out Debt Consolidation
  • Streamline Options Available

Learn More Apply Now

FHA Home Loans

Advantages of FHA Mortgages

  • Great 1st Time Buyers
  • Low Down Payment
  • Easier Credit Qualifying
  • 203K Renovations Loan

Learn More Apply Now

VA Home Loans

Advantages of VA Loans

  • Zero Down, 100% Financing
  • No Monthly Mortgage Insurance
  • No Debt to Income Restrictions
  • Jumbo Option with Down Payment

Learn More Apply Now

Conventional Home Loans

Conventional Loan Advantages

  • Primary, 2nd homes and Investment
  • Up to 97% Financing
  • No Up-front Funding Fees
  • Renovation Loan Programs

Learn More Apply Now

USDA Home Loans

Advantages of USDA Loans

  • 100% Financing Rural Properties
  • Primary Residence Only
  • Closing Costs Can be Rolled In
  • Home Repairs Can be Rolled In

Learn More Apply Now

Jumbo Home Loans

Advantages of Jumbo Mortgages

  • Primary & 2nd Homes
  • 80% Loan to Value
  • Fixed Rate and Arm Options
  • Reserves Required

Learn More Apply Now

moonlight Reverse Mortgage

Let your home work for you

  • No Monthly Mortgage Payments
  • Cash-Out Options
  • Money it Tax Free
  • No Credit Score Requirements

Learn More Apply Now

About Our Mortgage Company

Mortgage Lenders in moonlight & Local Customer Service

Lone Star Financing is a direct lender in moonlight with low rates and low fees. We offer an array of home loan products including Conventional loans, FHA, USDA, VA, and Jumbo loans.  And a direct lender,  we can close loans in as little as 30 days or less.


Unlike many online companies, we are local to moonlight and that means local customer service and VIP treatment. Our mortgage professionals are all experienced with moonlight home loans and can help customize the perfect loan just for you.  We will be there with you from application to closing – every step of the way.


As a direct mortgage lender, we offer in-house underwriting which enables us to make fast decisions and close loans fast. We are a technology driven company and offer a level of service that is second to none.


Being right around the corner from you means accountability, and rest assured you will get top notch customer service.  When you get a home loan at Lone Star Financing, we are there every step of the way from application to closing.


Your Local TEXAS MORTGAGE LENDER!

  • In-house Underwriting
  • No-Obligation Loan Estimate
  • Low Rates. Low Fees. Fast Closings
  • Local moonlight Customer Service
  • Close in as little as 30 Days

As a local Transcope Mortgage company headquartered in Grapevine, TX, we have the flexibility to underwrite your loan using common sense underwriting. Unlike many Transcope Mortgage companies that focus primary on rate and high-pressure sales, we educate you on the best home loan program for your individual needs, structure your mortgage according to your finances, and offer the lowest possible rates available. We will walk you step by step through the moonlight home loan process and keep you informed every step of the way. 

Thank you for considering Lone Star Financing as your home loan partner in moonlight—we look forward to earning your business and forging a long-term relationship. Apply online or call today for same day home loan approvals!

Our moonlight Locations

Locations we serve across moonlight: Looking to buy a new home or refinance in moonlight? No matter what moonlight city you live in our loan officers are here to help.  We are a moonlight licensed mortgage company and can close loans anywhere in moonlight.

Your Transcope Mortgage Company

Helping Open Doors Since 2007

Headquartered in Kingwood, TX with offices in Grapevine and Austin. We’re right around the corner and ready to help with your next moonlight home loan or mortgage refinance.

Lone Star Financing is a direct lender in moonlight with low rates and low fees – we strive to close all loans in 28 days or less. Our mission statement is simple:  integrity, customer service and upfront lending. It’s this simple recipe has propelled us to one of the top mortgage companies in moonlight.

We are an approved moonlight lender for FHA loans, VA loans, and USDA loans.  Call today or apply online in minutes!

Why Choose Lone Star Financing ?
